Dafür muss man erst den Remote Verlauf aufrufen. Da ist noch sehr viel Platz für Verbesserungen.

content_english: Postscript: Apparently something has happened on the developer side. Now, after installation, the app finally recognizes that I am already a registered BMW customer and automatically adds my car with the data from the customer database without further questions. Identification is now only possible via PIN, whereas fingerprint identification was an alternative before. Time selection for ventilation is not offered (or I haven't found it yet). With OS 7 vehicles having Spotify directly integrated into the car, it's much better than the old integration. And now that Android Auto is coming in the fall, everything is perfect.
